name: docpad-plugin-html2jade
description: Adds support for HTML to the Jade templating engine in DocPad.
readme:
# HTML2Jade Plugin for DocPad Adds support for HTML to [Jade](http://jade-lang.com/) compilation to [DocPad](https://github.com/bevry/docpad) Convention: `.jade.html` ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-html2coffee ``` ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
Copyright © 2012 [Bevry Pty Ltd](http://bevry.me)
Copyright © 2011 [Benjamin Lupton](http://balupton.com)
